import React from "react"; import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { setUser } from './redux/actions/user_actions' class SignUp extends React.Component{ handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(e.target) if (this.state.password === this.state.passwordConfirmation){ fetch("http://localhost:3000/api/v1/signup", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify({ first_name: e.target[0].value, last_name: e.target[1].value, username: e.target[2].value, location: e.target[3].value, email: e.target[4].value, phone_number: e.target[5].value, birthday: e.target[6].value, gender: e.target[7].value, bio: e.target[8].value, won_games: 0, tie_games: 0, lost_games: 0, admin: 0, team_id: null, password: e.target[9].value, passwordConfirmation: e.target[10].value }) }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(response => { if(response.errors){ alert(response.errors) } else { this.props.setUser(response) localStorage.token = response.token } }) } else { alert("Passwords don't match!") } } componentDidMount(){ } render(){ if (this.props.currentUser !== null && this.props.currentUser !== undefined) { return ; } return (

{/*

*/}

); } } function msp(state){ return { currentUser: state.userReducer.currentUser } } export default connect(msp, { setUser })(SignUp)
